page.title: 03MEDIA
page.content: { VIDEO,TELEVISION,ENTERTAINMENT. I have a video.I use it to record and watch films and programmes.I watch it mostly in the evening. Today we visited the supermarket on Westlands (Boycott) Estate which hires videos.It had about 200 to select from.These included comedy, thriller,childrens, sciencefiction, horror and many others.They were all graded.Gold star were Â£1.50 per night. Silver star were Â£1.25 per night and ordinary were Â£1.00 per night. We looked at the poster advertisements in the window.We saw Red Dawn and the Philadelphia Experiment.Red Dawn was about the Russians invading America. It was about the possibility of World War III starting.The Philadelphia Experiment was about to visit the future. The video has become a very popular pastime.
